/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/cc  -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX10.12.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/cpp-game-project.dir/sample.c.o CMakeFiles/cpp-game-project.dir/draw_function.c.o CMakeFiles/cpp-game-project.dir/get_clock_now.c.o  -o cpp-game-project -framework GLUT -framework Cocoa -framework OpenGL -lm
